H0.text: Where was the Titanic heading for on her maiden voyage. London

H1.text: Where was the Titanic heading for on her maiden voyage. Paris

H2.text: Where was the Titanic heading for on her maiden voyage. Boston

H3.text: Where was the Titanic heading for on her maiden voyage. Ny

A4.text: RMS Titanic was a British ocean liner that sank in the early hours of 15 April 1912 as a result of striking an iceberg on her maiden voyage from Southampton, England, to New York City, United States.

A5.text: Titanic was planned to arrive at New York Pier 59 on the morning of 17 April.
